feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 4:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. High 11. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
